00020 #ifndef URLPROTOCOLWRAPPER_H_
00021 #define URLPROTOCOLWRAPPER_H_
00022 
00023 #include <com/xuggle/xuggler/io/FfmpegIncludes.h>
00024 
00025 extern "C"
00026 {
00027   typedef struct URLProtocolWrapper
00028   {
00029     // This must be the first element in this wrapper to ensure we can
00030     // trick FFMPEG into passing it around for us.
00031     URLProtocol proto;
00032     // You can add anything you need after this.  This will be passed
00033     // in the URLContext->proto field in the protocol functions.
00034     // You should note that the same proto gets passed for all threads, and
00035     // so you should only have 'global' variables here.
00036     void * protocolMgr;
00037   } URLProtocolWrapper;
00038 }
00039 #endif /*URLPROTOCOLWRAPPER_H_*/
